segments.text: Jack ! Do you want to see a picture of my new puppy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . I thought people only showed off pictures of their new babies , not new pets !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , this is my new baby . He ’ s just as much trouble . That ’ s for sure ! But , he ’ s a lot of fun !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see what you mean . He ’ s really cute . How old is he ?
segments.speaker: S2
